title: Austrian Avian Association
description: Austrian Avian Association is a 18-level total conversion for Doom II, taking place in a 1800s Austrian alps setting. Play as Schnabelperchten doctor Katharina Berger as she has to fend off a sudden invasion of strange creatures! Then, journey to an excavated temple in the mountains of Croatia in search of a baetylus, which can revive the innocent lives that were lost during the invasion! This WAD contains three episodes, easily seen with a source port that supports UMAPINFO: -Frozen Hell: St...
